meanings.def: a building fitted with equipment for grinding grain into flour; a machine for grinding grain
examples: The old mill has been converted into apartments.
The mill can be seen grinding wheat.
The river was harnessed to drive many mills.

meanings.def: a factory that produces a particular type of material
examples: Raw materials were carried to the works by barge.

meanings.def: a small machine for grinding a solid substance into powder
to have or make somebody have a difficult time
examples: They really put me through the mill in my interview.

meanings.def: something that is useful to somebody for a particular purpose
examples: Political sex scandals are all grist to the mill of the tabloid newspapers.

idioms.idiom: go through the mill | put somebody through the mill
